-- Generated by style-generator, edit with care

module {{module_name}} exposing (
  CssClass,
  classes,
  join,
  {% for class in classes %}{{class|name}}{% if !loop.last %},
  {% endif %}{% endfor %}
  )

import Html
import Html.Attributes as Attributes
import List

type CssClass
    = CssClass String

join : List CssClass -> String
join cs =
    cs |> List.map (\(CssClass c) -> c) |> String.join " "

classes : List CssClass -> Html.Attribute msg
classes cs =
    Attributes.class <| join cs

{% for class in classes %}
{{class|name}} : CssClass
{{class|name}} =
    CssClass "{{class}}"
{% endfor %}
